job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Machine Learning/ ML Engineer Location: Anywhere in US but willing to work Pacific hours Duration: 6+ months Contract Experience : 7+ years Any Visa Except- CPT/OPT/ H1-T/*This is not an internship* Responsibility ● Work closely with  Machine Learning Engineers  and  Data Scientists  to understand, refine, and prioritize requirements ● Design and build our model serving service with simple, powerful APIs to capture our users/clients needs ● Build our core ML model lifecycle management system to provide an  ML-aware  release and deployment experience ● Improve machine learning data quality by using & building tools to automatically detect issues ● Create intelligent ML-aware real-time monitoring & observability systems ● Work closely with partner teams to integrate with other ML tools to create a seamless end-to-end experience ● Leverage open source technologies like  Kubeflow, Kubernetes, Spark, Docker, Airflow, Tensorflow and PyTorch   Qualification We are looking for engineers with: ● 8+ years of industry experience or a PhD +7 years industry experience in applied machine learning. ● Strong coding skills in  Python/Java/Scala or equivalent ● Experience with distributed  data processing tools  like  Hive, Spark, Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensor flow or Pytorch is preferred ● Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in production ● Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus ● Experience with  Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus ● Experience with distributed data processing tools  like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus ● Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a big plus Please reach out to farheen@exatechinc.com
